## creating a website

If you want to learn to create your own website or blog, we found Andrew Rapp's [ultimate guide to creating a Quarto blog](https://albert-rapp.de/posts/13_quarto_blog_writing_guide/13_quarto_blog_writing_guide.html), Beatriz Mills' guide to [creating a blog with Quarto in 10 steps](https://beamilz.com/posts/2022-06-05-creating-a-blog-with-quarto/en/), and Ezekiel Ekunola's instructions for [setting up a personalized domain address for your site](https://www.codementor.io/@ekunolaeasybuoy/setting-up-domain-with-namecheap-netlify-12yiksvig6).
